step_feedback.feedback: Good job closing your fingers into fists and drawing your arms in. Remember to inhale and tighten your muscles during this step.
You're opening your fingers and extending your arms well. Make sure to exhale and relax your muscles as you do this.
Continue to focus on opening your fingers and extending your arms horizontally. Remember to exhale and relax your muscles.
Your arm extension is good. Ensure you are fully exhaling and relaxing your muscles as you complete this movement.
Great job completing the repetitions! Remember to keep your movements controlled and focus on the breath and muscle engagement as instructed.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the horizontal pumping exercise! Remember to focus on squeezing your fists and tightening your muscles as you inhale, then relax and exhale as you extend your arms. Keep up the good work!
